dcterms:description: A large-scale collection for recipe retrieval, including cooking instructions along with food images. The dataset consists of over 1M textual recipes and around 900K images, with 238,399 matching pairs of recipes and images for training, 51,119 pairs for validation, and 51,303 pairs for testing.
dcterms:title: Recipe1M
